name: Sofia the First (Season 2)
summary: Amber seeks a magic spell so she won't have to share her birthday with James...
info:
• 中文名: 小公主苏菲亚 第二季
  • 话数: 29
  • 放送开始: 2014年3月7日
  • 放送星期: 星期四
  • 动画制作: Disney Television Animation
  • 官方网站: http://disneyjunior.disney.com/sofia-the-first
  • 播放电视台: Disney Channel
  • 播放结束: 2015年8月12日

eps.name: Two Princesses and a Baby
eps.desc: Amber seeks a magic spell so she won't have to share her birthday with James.

eps.name: The Enchanted Feast
eps.desc: Cedric is preparing to show off his magical skills at the Enchanted Feast: a grand dinner for all of the kings and queens in the Tri-Kingdom Area. When the evil fairy Miss Nettle disguises herself as a powerful sorceress known as Sascha and takes over the feast after tricking Roland into welcoming her in by showering the royal family with gifts, Sofia forms an unlikely team with Clover, Cedric and Wormwood to protect her amulet and save her family. Sofia learns, after summoning the Snow White, to trust her instincts.

eps.name: The Flying Crown
eps.desc: Sofia teams up with Prince Hugo for the Flying Derby championship race.

eps.name: Mom's the Word
eps.desc: Amber and James are invited to join Sofia's traditional Mother's Day picnic with her mom.

eps.name: The Silent Knight
eps.desc: Sofia meets a brave knight who is ashamed of his odd voice.

eps.name: Enchanted Science Fair
eps.desc: Sofia and her friends race to find a magical ingredient for their enchanted science projects.

eps.name: When You Wish Upon a Well
eps.desc: Amber makes a wish in a wishing well that accidentally turns Sofia into a cat!

eps.name: Gizmo Gwen
eps.desc: Sofia helps a young kitchen maid pursue her dream of being an inventor.

eps.name: Sofia the Second
eps.desc: Sofia casts a magic spell that creates a mischievous identical twin!

eps.name: Mystic Meadows
eps.desc: Sofia visits a magical retirement home for sorcerers and helps Cedric earn his family's powerful wand and his father's respect.

eps.name: Princesses to the Rescue!
eps.desc: On a trip to Wei-Ling, Sofia and Amber must rescue their families from a treasure-hoarding tiger.

eps.name: Ghostly Gala
eps.desc: Sofia tries to keep a ghost from scaring everyone out of the castle on Halloween.

eps.name: The Emerald Key
eps.desc: Sofia and her family must figure out which of two mysterious visitors is a real princess.

eps.name: Scrambled Pets
eps.desc: Sofia and her friends bring their pets to school, but immediately regret the decision when they accidentally get scrambled during a sorcery class.

eps.name: The Princess Stays in the Picture
eps.desc: Sofia and Hildegard get stuck inside a painting, but finding an escape plan gets more complicated when Hildegard insists she knows everything.

eps.name: Baileywhoops
eps.desc: Baileywick is cursed by a new castle steward, in an attempt to take over his job. Sofia decides to help him out by becoming his steward assistant.

eps.name: The Curse of Princess Ivy
eps.desc: Princess Ivy has turned the whole kingdom of Enchancia black and white! It's up to Sofia and Amber to save the day.

eps.name: Winter's Gift
eps.desc: It's winter and Sofia and her friends are planning a holiday celebration and light show in the village.

eps.name: The Leafsong Festival
eps.desc: The animals are planning to put on a singing talent show. Crackle wants to sing in the show but her fire is getting in the way. Cedric jumps on the chance to take over the kingdom by using Crackle's flame that she wants to get rid of so she can sing in the show.

eps.name: Substitute Cedric
eps.desc: Cedric steps in as substitute teacher for Sofia's sorcery class and helps the students of Royal Prep protect their school after a group of visiting pranksters arrive to wreak havoc.

eps.name: Clover Time
eps.desc: Sofia is trying to plan time with Clover, when strange new activities pop up. Sofia is going to have to choose Clover over friends.

eps.name: In a Tizzy
eps.desc: After teaming up with an over-eager fairy godmother, Sofia's friend Ruby learns that a little assistance is nice, but sometimes you have to do things on your own.

eps.name: A Tale of Two Teams
eps.desc: It's field day at school and everybody is excited to play against each other, except Amber.

relations.title: Sofia the First: Once Upon a Princess
Elena and the Secret of Avalor
